title: Blocks Resource Definition
description: The blocks.json file in a resource pack defines texture and sound mappings for blocks. Each block entry maps a block identifier to its visual and audio properties.

tokens.text: maps block identifiers to their textures and sound properties

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of the blocks.json file. Can be an array like [1, 1, 0] or a string like '1.1.0'.

customField.title: Block Entry
customField.description: Defines texture and sound properties for a specific block. The key should match the block's identifier (e.g., 'stone', 'grass').

subForm.title: Block Resource Definition
subForm.description: Texture and sound configuration for a block.

fields.title: Textures
fields.description: The texture(s) to use for this block. Can be a single texture name string for all faces, or an object specifying textures per face.

fields.title: Up
fields.description: Texture for the top face of the block.

fields.title: Down
fields.description: Texture for the bottom face of the block.

fields.title: Side
fields.description: Texture for the side faces of the block.

fields.title: North
fields.description: Texture for the north face of the block.

fields.title: South
fields.description: Texture for the south face of the block.

fields.title: East
fields.description: Texture for the east face of the block.

fields.title: West
fields.description: Texture for the west face of the block.

fields.title: Carried Textures
fields.description: Textures used when the block is being carried or displayed in the inventory. Structure is the same as textures.

fields.title: Up
fields.description: Carried texture for the top face.

fields.title: Down
fields.description: Carried texture for the bottom face.

fields.title: Side
fields.description: Carried texture for the side faces.

fields.title: Sound
fields.description: The sound group to use for this block (e.g., 'stone', 'wood', 'grass', 'gravel', 'sand'). Determines sounds for walking, breaking, and placing.

fields.title: Isotropic
fields.description: Whether the block uses isotropic (orientation-independent) textures. Can be a boolean for all faces or an object specifying per-face.

fields.title: All Faces
fields.description: Apply isotropic setting to all faces.

fields.title: Up
fields.description: Isotropic setting for the top face.

fields.title: Down
fields.description: Isotropic setting for the bottom face.

fields.title: Side
fields.description: Isotropic setting for side faces.

fields.title: Brightness Gamma
fields.description: Gamma correction value for the block's brightness.

fields.title: Ambient Occlusion Exponent
fields.description: Controls the ambient occlusion effect strength. Lower values result in less shadow in corners.

note: This file uses block identifiers as dynamic keys. The format_version field is the only fixed field; all other properties are block-specific entries.
